subject: Hockey, Ice
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: Marek Svatos scored 2 minutes 5 seconds into overtime Saturday night to help the Colorado Avalanche snap a four-game losing streak with a victory over the Islanders.
snippet: Marek Svatos scored 2 minutes 5 seconds into overtime Saturday night to help the Colorado Avalanche snap a four-game losing streak with a victory over the Islanders.
